meanings.definition: A type of Japanese noodle dish.
meanings.sent1: I tried degami for the first time at a Japanese restaurant.
meanings.sent2: My favorite dish at the Japanese restaurant is degami.
meanings.sent3: The degami was so delicious that I wanted to learn how to make it myself.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of degami filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent5: The steaming bowl of degami was a comforting sight on a cold day.

meanings.definition: To cook or prepare food using a specific method.
meanings.sent1: I will degami the vegetables by stir-frying them in a wok.
meanings.sent2: She loves to degami by following traditional recipes.
meanings.sent3: He tried to degami a new recipe but ended up burning the dish.
meanings.sent4: The chef will degami the steak to perfection on the grill.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of spices filled the kitchen as she began to degami the curry.

meanings.definition: A person who specializes in preparing and serving food.
meanings.sent1: The degami at the restaurant recommended the best dish on the menu.
meanings.sent2: My friend is a talented degami who can create amazing culinary delights.
meanings.sent3: The degami entertained the guests with his culinary skills at the party.
meanings.sent4: The degami's passion for food shines through in every dish he prepares.
meanings.sent5: The degami's expertise in the kitchen is truly impressive.
